en: And the word of Jehovah came unto me, saying,
hmr: LALPA thu chu ka kuomah a hung tlung a:

en: Son of man, set thy face toward the children of Ammon, and prophesy against them:
hmr: “Mihriem naupa, Ammon thlahai tieng chun i hmai innghat la, an chungchânga chun thu hril rawh;

en: and say unto the children of Ammon, Hear the word of the Lord Jehovah: Thus saith the Lord Jehovah, Because thou saidst, Aha, against my sanctuary, when it was profaned; and against the land of Israel, when it was made desolate; and against the house of Judah, when they went into captivity:
hmr: Ammon thlahai kuoma chun hieng hin hril la, Lalpa PATHIEN thu chu lo ngai unla, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a ti a nih: Ka hmun inthieng chu sukhmingsiet a ni laiin le, Israel ram chu râusan a ni laiin le, Juda sûngkuo chu sala an intâng lai khan, ‘I hih,’ i lo ti tâk lei khan;

en: therefore, behold, I will deliver thee to the children of the east for a possession, and they shall set their encampments in thee, and make their dwellings in thee; they shall eat thy fruit, and they shall drink thy milk.
hmr: ngai ta, an nei ding chein khaw- sak mi thlahai kuoma chun ka pêk ding che a nih; an chêngna hmunhai chu i sûnga chun siem an ta, an umna hmunhai chu innghat an tih; chun, i tui chu dâwnin i nênetui khawm chu dâwn bawk an tih.

en: And I will make Rabbah a stable for camels, and the children of Ammon a couching-place for flocks: and ye shall know that I am Jehovah.
hmr: Rabba chu sanghâwngseihai ta dinga inah siem ka ta, Ammon thlahai hmun chu berâmhai ta dinga bawk khâwmna hmunah siem ka tih; chun, LALPA ka nih ti mi hre tâng in tih.

en: For thus saith the Lord Jehovah: Because thou hast clapped thy hands, and stamped with the feet, and rejoiced with all the despite of thy soul against the land of Israel;
hmr: Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a ti sih a; Israel ram chunga hin i lungrila hmusitna po po leh i lo lâwm tah a, i kehai i lo tet a, i kuthai i lo ben tâk leiin;

en: therefore, behold, I have stretched out my hand upon thee, and will deliver thee for a spoil to the nations; and I will cut thee off from the peoples, and I will cause thee to perish out of the countries: I will destroy thee; and thou shalt know that I am Jehovah.
hmr: ngai ta, ka kut chu i chungah kân let tah a, hnamhai kuoma chun râllâk sum dingin ka pêk ding che a nih; chun, hnamhai laia inthawkin sât- thlâng ka ti cheh a; ramhaia in- thawka bohmang dingin siem ka ti che; chun, sukbohmang ka ti cheh a, chun, LALPA chu ka nih ti mi hre tâng i tih.

en: Thus saith the Lord Jehovah: Because that Moab and Seir do say, Behold, the house of Judah is like unto all the nations;
hmr: “Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih: Moab le Seir chun, ‘Ngai ta u, Juda sûngkuo hi hnam dang po pohai ang bawk a nih,’ an ti leiin,

en: therefore, behold, I will open the side of Moab from the cities, from his cities which are on his frontiers, the glory of the country, Beth-jeshimoth, Baal-meon, and Kiriathaim,
hmr: Ngai ta, Moab sîr khat, khawpui hmawrtâwnghaia inthawkin, a ram ropuina Beth-jesimoth, Baal-meon le Kiriathaim tieng chu ka hawng ding a nih;

en: unto the children of the east, to go against the children of Ammon; and I will give them for a possession, that the children of Ammon may not be remembered among the nations:
hmr: saktieng mihai thlahai kuoma chun an nei dingin Ammon thlahai leh pêng ka tih; Ammon thlahai chu hnamhai laia hriet zing a ni ta nawna dingin.

en: and I will execute judgments upon Moab; and they shall know that I am Jehovah.
hmr: Chun, Moab chunga chun rorêl- na chu sukthlûng ka ta; chun, LALPA chu ka nih ti mi hre tâng an tih.

en: Thus saith the Lord Jehovah: Because that Edom hath dealt against the house of Judah by taking vengeance, and hath greatly offended, and revenged himself upon them;
hmr: “Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih: Edom hi Juda sûngkuo chungah phuba lain le, maw nasatak inphurtirin le, an chunga thungin a lo sawisak tâk leiin,

en: therefore thus saith the Lord Jehovah, I will stretch out my hand upon Edom, and will cut off man and beast from it; and I will make it desolate from Teman; even unto Dedan shall they fall by the sword.
hmr: Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih: Edom chunga chun ka kut inlet ka ta, amaa inthawk chun ramsa le mihriem khawm sât thlâng ka tih, Temana inthawkin râusanah siem ka ta; Dedan chenin kâwlhnâmah tlûng an tih.

en: And I will lay my vengeance upon Edom by the hand of my people Israel; and they shall do in Edom according to mine anger and according to my wrath; and they shall know my vengeance, saith the Lord Jehovah.
hmr: Chun, ka mi Israelhai kut hmangin Edom chunga chun ka phuba lâkna chu sieng ka ta, ka ṭitumna ang pei le ka lunginsenna ang peiin Edoma chun thâwng an tih; chuongchun, ka phuba lâk chu hre tâng an tih, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih.

en: Thus saith the Lord Jehovah: Because the Philistines have dealt by revenge, and have taken vengeance with despite of soul to destroy with perpetual enmity;
hmr: “Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih: Philistin mihai chu phuba lâk angin an lo sawisakin, theida zing zinga sukse dingin lungrila hmusit pumin phuba an lo lâk a,

en: therefore thus saith the Lord Jehovah, Behold, I will stretch out my hand upon the Philistines, and I will cut off the Cherethites, and destroy the remnant of the sea coast.
hmr: chuleiin, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih: Ngai ta, Philistin mihai chunga chun ka kut inlet ka ta, Kereth mihai chu sât thlâng ka ta, tuipui panga mi um sun hai chu sukbohmang ka tih.

en: And I will execute great vengeance upon them with wrathful rebukes; and they shall know that I am Jehovah, when I shall lay my vengeance upon them.
hmr: Chun, kâwkna ṭiumtak leh phubalâkna nasatak chu intlungtir ka ta; chun, LALPA chu ka nih ti mi hre tâng an tih; ka phubalâkna chu an chunga kân nghat pha chun,” tiin.
